paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses various TTR variants associated with ATTR amyloidosis, focusing on the Val30Met variant and its implications for disease penetrance and treatment strategies.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: hTTR V30M HSF1± transgenic mice were administered a single injection of siTTR1, siTTR2 or their respective controls and evaluated for liver TTR mRNA and serum TTR protein knockdown.

functional_data.summary: In vitro analysis showed that siTTR silenced wt and mutant TTR gene constructs with similar efficacy and potency.

variants.segregation_data: The phenotype is fully penetrant in mice older than 12 months of age.
variants.additional_notes: The study emphasizes the importance of TTR lowering in the treatment of ATTR amyloidosis.
key_quotes: The phenotype is fully penetrant in mice older than 12 months of age and is therefore a good model for evaluating the therapeutic hypothesis of TTR lowering in ATTR amyloidosis.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper focused on TTR variants and their implications.
